If you are between sizes or need assistance selecting the proper size, please contact Customer Service Designer Mention KORS by Michael Kors shoes, and images of polished, sleek, sophisticated creations come to mind. The jet-set, luxurious attitude of Michael Kors's creations have given him a seemingly endless list of celebrity fans and awards. Michael Kors got his start designing and merchandising a collection for Lothar's in New York at the young age of 19. He struck out on his own in 1981, and his line has continued to grow in the exceptional experience of this seasoned professional.
